name: Quality Control Functional Build
description:
Here is my functional build for my game Quality Control. The goal of the game is to get as many cows beamed up into the blue tractor beam as possible before time runs out. Right now there is no win or loss condition but as soon as you abduct your first cow, a special cow should spawn.

The rules are simple:

WASD = movement 

R = Pick up and drop cows
